name: aftermath

effect.scarlet_violet: When this Pokémon is knocked out by a move that makes contact, the move's user takes 1/4 its maximum HP in damage.
effect.the_teal_mask: When this Pokémon is knocked out by a move that makes contact, the move's user takes 1/4 its maximum HP in damage.
effect.the_indigo_disk: When this Pokémon is knocked out by a move that makes contact, the move's user takes 1/4 its maximum HP in damage.
effect.legends_za: When this Pokémon is knocked out by a move that makes contact, the move's user takes 1/4 its maximum HP in damage.

short_effect: Damages the attacker for 1/4 its max HP when knocked out by a contact move.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: Damages the attacker if it knocks out the Pokémon with a move that makes direct contact.
